feed.title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let's fix it

entry.title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let's fix it
entry.summary: As there is no provided context or email content to summarize, I'm unable to create a blog post based on the given instructions. If you provide the text of the email or the specific programming-related content that you want summarized into a blog post, I can assist with creating a summary following the rules you've outlined. Please share the relevant content, and I'll be happy to help!
